arts.ttl: Atlético Madrid boss Diego Simeone comments on new Champions League format: ‘It means we have to win’
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid left it late on Thursday night before José Giménez’s 90th-minute winner secured all three points in a 2-1 win over RB Leipzig. Goals from Antoine Griezmann and Benjamin…

arts.ttl: Antoine Griezmann hails Atlético Madrid teammate after win over RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid star Antoine Griezmann has late on Thursday moved to reveal his appreciation for another leading member of Diego Simeone’s squad. As much, of course, comes fresh off a…

arts.ttl: Match Reaction | Should RB Leipzig part ways with Marco Rose?
arts.sum: RB Leipzig kicked off their Champions League campaign with a 2-1 defeat away to Atlético Madrid, as their inconsistent start to the season continues to haunt them. Despite having ended…
Watch as Antoine Griezmann's "sensational finish" sees Atletico Madrid equalise against RB Leipzig during their opening match in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Leipzig fall to defeat in Madrid as Giménez grabs glory for Atlético
arts.sum: Die Roten Bullen made the trip to the Spanish capital for a meeting with Atlético Madrid this evening. Marco Rose's side found an early lead through Xavi Simons before Antoine Griezmann restored parity and Jose Giménez struck late as Atlético ran out 2-1 winners.

arts.ttl: Champions League Player Ratings | Atletico Madrid 2-1 RB Leipzig

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Atlético Madrid vs. RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Marco Rose's team have made the trip to the Spanish capital to get their UEFA Champions League campaign underway with a challenging matchup against Atlético Madrid where both lineups have just been announced.
Jamie Griffith has taken a look at the whole fixture list for week four of the Bundesliga season and selected a score prediction for each game.

arts.ttl: Preview | Atlético Madrid vs RB Leipzig: A big test for The Saxons
arts.sum: RB Leipzig face a tough opening Champions League away to Atlético Madrid. With games against Juventus, Inter, and Liverpool to come, it’s crucial The Saxons get off to the perfect…

arts.ttl: Atlético Madrid vs. RB Leipzig: UEFA Champions League team news, match stats & LIVE blog!
arts.sum: Xavi and Loïs Openda are among the RB Leipzig gems looking to star on the continental stage after making a strong start to their Bundesliga campaign as they visit Diego Simeone's Atlético Madrid in their opening UEFA Champions League fixture on Thursday (kick-off: 9pm CEST). New signing Antonio Nusa also looks ready to make an impact on the European stage if called upon, the Norwegian teenager having already scored off the bench in the Bundesliga and DFB Cup. Captain and defensive lynchpin Willi Orbán is back at head coach Marco Rose's disposal again, meanwhile, after a domestic suspension ruled him out of the goalless draw with Union Berlin on Matchday 3.
